title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course for Improving Learner Satisfaction in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with online learning tools and basic language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Targets current practitioners (language educators, etc.) focusing on satisfaction analysis based on learner characteristics and improvement strategies in blended learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Analyze and explain three or more differences in adaptation to blended learning environments between new/existing learners.
Design and apply a learner satisfaction prediction model using real-time log data.
Propose personalized educational design strategies based on learner characteristics through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
